Name: Drumpf 2: Lost, But Not Forgotten!
About the game: Drumpf 2: Lost, But Not Forgotten! is an erotic 2D RPG set in the fictional land of Amerika. In this second installment of the Drumpf! series, you re-assume the mantle of Drumpf; once God-Emperor of the super-continent of Amerika, now downtrodden freedom fighter, facing former friends. After liberating the oppressed denizens of Suborno and DÃ©chu from hordes of 'asylum seekers' and 'economic migrants', Drumpf and his Fighters For Freedom must race back to Drumpf's homeland - the birthplace of Fire, Fury, and Freedom - Libertonia. Features Your party consists of 4 characters, each with their own unique skills and class. Turn-based JRPG combat system. Face off against the media mogul Lord Billary, Duke of Arkans, and his puppet-president, Hilaria. Join forces with Goldwater, street-smart slum-dog with no memories and a heart of gold. Aid Kim Kil Yu in hunting the fiendish fables of North Libertonia! A plethora of dungeons and puzzles to explore! Over 50 enemies! 62 Unique bromides to collect! Over 59 piece of armor and weapons. Over 40 minutes of original music.
